Html:
Silverlight navigation application supports changing of address line in browser. It's good idea for bookmarking.

Prism v4 supports navigation.

What about mixing these featutes?

We did some proof of concept work to ensure that we do nothing to prevert plugging into the Silverlight Navigation features, and made a few changes to easily enable adding the functionality.  Unfortunately, this item did not make the cut line to get "in the box" for v4.  However, Karl we will be doing blog posts showing how to tie into the built in Silverlight Navigation system via a custom Frame adapter and a custom Content Loader.  I am sure we will link to them from this site once they go live.

Ooops.  I missed that Karl posted this the other day:

http://blogs.msdn.com/b/kashiffl/archive/2010/10/05/integrating-prism-v4-region-navigation-with-silverlight-frame-navigation.aspx

I hope that helps you out.
Thank you, I also found Karl's post few minutes after creating discussion here.
